sentences.english: Adult literacy is a global problem.
We still have a literacy problem.
This year, International Literacy Day places a special focus on the essential relationship between and peace.
sentences.chinese: 今年的國際掃盲日特別關注掃盲與和平的必然聯繫。

sentences.english: This year, International Literacy Day places a special focus on the essential relationship between and peace.
sentences.chinese: 今年的國際掃盲日特別關注掃盲與和平的必然聯繫。

sentences.english: Even some of the smallest communities are served by a county literacy council.
sentences.chinese: 即使是由掃盲委員會提供的最小的團體都可以。

sentences.english: While in the Soviet Area we opened literacy classes and peasants' schools.
sentences.chinese: 在蘇區時，我們開辦過掃盲班和農民學校。

sentences.english: Elimination of the illiterate person in the farmer is the mainly task of farmer's pastimecultural education.
sentences.chinese: 農民業餘文化教育的主要任務是對農民進行掃盲。

sentences.english: She must be in the literacy class held by Rural Women.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽一定去《農家女》辦的婦女掃盲班了。

sentences.english: Investing in literacy programs is a sensible and essential development choice.
sentences.chinese: 投資掃盲計劃是一個明智而又必要的發展選擇。

sentences.english: Literacy, the foundation of all education and lifelong learning, is one of these rights.
sentences.chinese: 掃盲就是一項人權，是全民教育和終身學習的基礎。

sentences.english: Around the teaching of literacy materials prepared must cover the entire contents of basic courses.
sentences.chinese: 各地掃盲教學材料的編寫須覆蓋基本課程的全部內容。

sentences.english: The campaign to wipe out illiteracy launched out with great vigour.
sentences.chinese: 掃盲運動生氣勃勃地展開了。

definition: see 直截了當|直截了当[zhi2 jie2 liao3 dang4]
"sensational headline writers", people who write misleading titles in order to generate clicks from Internet users/clickbait
to speak without thinking (idiom)/to blurt sth out
to make an exhibition of oneself/to be a disgrace
Chinese back-sloping comma 、 (punct. used to separate items in a list)
to spend effort/to take trouble/May I trouble you to...? (as part of polite request)/Please would you mind...?
to tell the truth/to tell it as it is
